page.title: 17BRIDPORT NEWS
page.content:
We went to the{Bridport News}and we found out that 7,500 copies of the Bridport News are sold each week. The {Bridport News}is printed in{Yeovil. } They sell the Bridport News to shops in{Bridport.}They do not deliver direct to homes. The Bridport News is printed at 2.30pm on{Friday } afternoon.They get about 180 reports every week.
The main item of news in the Bridport News at the moment is the development of{West Bay}in the future. The first Bridport News paper was printed in {1855. }
